short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Amazing new tab transformation with changing backgrounds, clock and popular social website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark Hub: Transforming Your New Tab into a Dynamic and Organized Browsing Experience

Bookmark Hub is an innovative Chrome extension that revolutionizes your new tab page, elevating it into a dynamic and organized hub for all your browsing needs. Gone are the days of uninspiring blank tabs - with Bookmark Hub, every new tab becomes a personalized gateway to productivity and discovery.

By clicking "add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Bookmark Hub extension, and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use https://bookmark-hub.com/tos.html
and Privacy Policy https://bookmark-hub.com/privacy.html
